reviewText:
Pleasantly surprised !

At first I was a little afraid of the Rubik's cube" appearance  of the game cause it traumatized me during my childhood.
I never managed to make a complete cube..It's frustrating.

But then CubiKolor reconciles me with cubes. For a puzzle game I havent been blocked yet but I feel I have fought like a demon to get my cube to the right place at the right time!

I havent rage quit yet...really encouraging !"
voteText: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
i bought CubiKolor today. I had the chance to play the game during a french festival and it was very fun.
After playing a couple of hours, I can say I had the same fun. It's very rewarding to play and pass over the tests.
Frustrating, but not enough to be boring, colourful and a very zen music, I had a doubt on that detail but I have to admit the music is a good point, and help to focus.

Be sure to be a great fan of puzzle games, this one is really good, but like all puzzle games, you have to be prepared, it will be a great challenge...and I love that!
